title: 471.82 REPEALER, EXCEPTIONS.
text: Laws 1929, chapter 303; Laws 1931, chapter 342; Laws 1933, chapters 210, 275, and 415; and Laws 1935, chapter 261, are hereby repealed, except that the provisions thereof regulating the making and allocating of levies for the payment of bonds issued thereunder and interest thereon, and any other provisions relating to tax levies, shall remain in force.
